questions.title: What is Product Management?
questions.prompt: Explain what product management is and what a product manager does.
followups: How does product management differ from project management?
What are the key responsibilities of a product manager?

questions.title: Product Lifecycle
questions.prompt: What are the main stages of a product lifecycle?
followups: How do product manager responsibilities change at each stage?
What metrics might you track in each phase?

questions.title: User Personas
questions.prompt: What are user personas and why are they important?
followups: How do you create effective user personas?
What information should be included in a persona?

questions.title: MVP Definition
questions.prompt: What does MVP stand for and why is it important?
followups: How do you decide what features go into an MVP?
What's the difference between MVP and prototype?

questions.title: Prioritization Basics
questions.prompt: Why is prioritization important in product management?
followups: What factors should you consider when prioritizing features?
What are some simple prioritization frameworks?

questions.title: Stakeholder Management
questions.prompt: Who are typical stakeholders a product manager works with?
followups: How do you manage conflicting stakeholder requests?
Why is stakeholder communication important?

questions.title: User Stories
questions.prompt: What are user stories and how are they written?
followups: What makes a good user story?
What's the typical format for a user story?

questions.title: Success Metrics
questions.prompt: What are some common metrics product managers track?
followups: What's the difference between leading and lagging indicators?
How do you choose which metrics to track?

questions.title: Competitive Analysis
questions.prompt: Why is competitive analysis important for product managers?
followups: What information should you gather about competitors?
How often should you conduct competitive analysis?

questions.title: Roadmap Basics
questions.prompt: What is a product roadmap and what should it include?
followups: What's the difference between a roadmap and a backlog?
How do you communicate roadmap changes to stakeholders?

questions.title: Agile Methodology
questions.prompt: What is Agile and why do product teams use it?
followups: What are the key principles of Agile?
How does Scrum differ from Kanban?

questions.title: Customer Feedback
questions.prompt: Why is customer feedback important and how do you collect it?
followups: What are different methods for collecting feedback?
How do you handle negative customer feedback?

questions.title: Product-Market Fit
questions.prompt: What is product-market fit and why is it important?
followups: How do you know when you've achieved product-market fit?
What are signs that you don't have product-market fit?

questions.title: Feature Definition
questions.prompt: How do you define what makes a good feature?
followups: What questions should you ask before building a feature?
How do you validate that a feature will be valuable?

questions.title: Go-to-Market Strategy
questions.prompt: What is a go-to-market strategy and what does it include?
followups: Who should be involved in creating a GTM strategy?
What are key components of a successful launch?
